posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Utterances setup for the Hexo Minos Theme
posts.text: 網路上已經有很多Hexo主題設置相關的文章，本篇介紹如何為Minos主題設置utterances留言區。 安裝 在Github創建一個Repository，設為public 安裝utterances app (選Only select repositories使用步驟一的那個repo) 輸入 owner/repo，即要放留言的Github倉庫名稱 設定 issue 標題的開法 選擇 comment 區的主題樣式 在\themes\minos\layout\comment底下新增一個utterances.ejs檔案，將自動產生的程式碼貼進這個檔案裡 在\themes\minos\_config.yml裡的comment區塊填上utterances，如下 1234# Comment plugin settings.comment: type: utterances shortname: Referenceshttps://annkuoq.github.io/blog/2020-03-09-add-utterances-comment-widget-to-hexo/
